text: David Theodore Blaauw is a professor in the Electrical and Computer Engineering program at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for contributions to adaptive and low power circuit design. ==Education == *B.S. from Duke University, 1986 *Ph.D. from the University of Illinois, UrbanaUniversity of Michigan bio == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:University of Michigan faculty Category:Duke University alumni Category:University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: David Theodore Blaauw
